metadata.synopsis: Player characters comment on smelling and seeing a decomposing corpse when entering the cellar of a tollhouse.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Ugh, that stench. Body must have been here a good while.
0.context: NodeContext: just entered a cellar where a decomposing corpse is creating a horrible stench - disgusted
